summary.span: 代表 的可绑定数据的自定义视图，它用于排序、筛选、搜索、编辑和导航。

span.span: Represents a databindable, customized view of a for sorting, filtering, searching, editing, and navigation.

summary.span: 不存储数据，而改为表示对应的 的连接视图。

span.span: The does not store data, but instead represents a connected view of its corresponding .

summary.span: 更改 的数据将影响 。

span.span: Changes to the ’s data will affect the .

summary.span: 更改 的数据将影响与之关联的所有 。

span.span: Changes to the ’s data will affect all s associated with it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要函数是为了允许 Windows 窗体和 Web 窗体上的数据绑定。A major function of the is to allow for data binding on both Windows Forms and Web Forms. 此外，可以自定义呈现的数据子集。Additionally, a can be customized to present a subset of data from the . 此功能使你具有两个控件绑定到同一，但该显示不同版本的数据。This capability lets you have two controls bound to the same , but that show different versions of the data. 例如，一个控件可能绑定到在表中，显示的所有行和第二个可能会配置为只显示的行已删除从。For example, one control might be bound to a that shows all the rows in the table, and a second might be configured to display only the rows that have been deleted from the . 还有属性。The also has a property. 这将返回默认值表。This returns the default for the table. 例如，如果你想要创建对表的自定义视图，设置上返回。For example, if you want to create a custom view on the table, set the on the returned by the . 若要创建数据的筛选和排序视图，设置和属性。To create a filtered and sorted view of data, set the and properties. 然后，使用属性以返回单个。Then, use the property to return a single . 你可以添加和删除的行使用集中和方法。You can also add and delete from the set of rows using the and methods. 当你使用这些方法，属性可以设置以指定只有已删除的行或新行，会显示通过。When you use those methods, the property can set to specify that only deleted rows or new rows be displayed by the . > [!NOTE] > 如果不显式指定的排序条件`DataView`、`DataRowView`中的对象`DataView`根据 DataView 的相应索引按`DataRow`中`DataTable.Rows` `DataRowCollection`。If you do not explicitly specify sort criteria for `DataView`, the `DataRowView` objects in `DataView` are sorted based on the index of DataView's corresponding `DataRow` in the `DataTable.Rows` `DataRowCollection`. [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] 允许开发人员通过创建复杂且功能强大的查询使用[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]。 allows developers to create complex, powerful queries over a by using [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]. A[!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)]查询返回的枚举对象，但是，这些对象轻松不绑定方案中使用。A [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] query returns an enumeration of objects, however, which is not easily used in a binding scenario. 可以从创建[!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)]查询，会采取筛选和排序的查询的特征。 can be created from a [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] query and takes on the filtering and sorting characteristics of that query. [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] 扩展的功能通过提供[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]基于表达式的筛选和排序，这样，对于更复杂而功能强大的筛选和排序执行比基于字符串的筛选和排序操作。 extends the functionality of the by providing [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] expression-based filtering and sorting, which allows for much more complex and powerful filtering and sorting operations than string-based filtering and sorting. 请参阅[数据绑定和 LINQ to DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/data-binding-and-linq-to-dataset.md)有关详细信息。See [Data Binding and LINQ to DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/data-binding-and-linq-to-dataset.md) for more information. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个具有一个列和五个行。The following example creates a single with one column and five rows. 两个创建对象和上每个设置为显示表数据的不同视图。Two objects are created and the is set on each to show different views of the table data. 然后打印值。The values are then printed. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataView Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataView Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataView Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataView Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的示例创建按排序的联机订单的应付款的总额[!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)]查询：The following example creates a of online orders ordered by total due from a [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] query: [!code-csharp[DP DataView Samples#CreateLDVFromQuery1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DP DataView Samples/CS/Form1.cs#createldvfromquery1)] [!code-vb[DP DataView Samples#CreateLDVFromQuery1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DP DataView Samples/VB/Form1.vb#createldvfromquery1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Visual Studio.NET 设计环境使用此方法来启动窗体上使用或由另一个组件的组件的初始化。The Visual Studio .NET design environment uses this method to start the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component. 方法初始化已结束。The method ends the initialization. 使用`BeginInit`和`EndInit`方法阻止控件完全初始化之前使用。Using the `BeginInit` and `EndInit` methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A位于"视图"因为它提供自定义的排序和筛选数据。A is a "view" on a because it provides custom sorting and filtering of the data. 可以查询属性来确定是否已被使用打开方法。The property can be queried to determine whether a has been opened by using the method. 此属性设计为仅限内部使用。This property is designed for internal use only.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string RowFilter { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property RowFilter As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ RowFilter { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于筛选在 中查看哪些行的表达式。

span.span: Gets or sets the expression used to filter which rows are viewed in the .

value.span: 用于指定行的筛选方式的字符串。

span.span: A string that specifies how rows are to be filtered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向窗体值时，请指定跟运算符和一个值，要作为筛选依据的列的名称。To form a value, specify the name of a column followed by an operator and a value to filter on. 值必须用引号引起来。The value must be in quotation marks. 例如:For example: "LastName = 'Smith'""LastName = 'Smith'" 请参阅属性有关详细信息的类。See the property of the class for more information. 若要只返回那些列具有 null 值，请使用以下表达式：To return only those columns with null values, use the following expression: "Isnull(Col1,'Null Column') = 'Null Column'""Isnull(Col1,'Null Column') = 'Null Column'" ## Examples 下面的示例创建并设置其属性。The following example creates a and sets its property. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataView.RowFilter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataView.RowFilter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataView.RowFilter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataView.RowFilter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Data::DataViewRowState RowStateFilter { System::Data::DataViewRowState get(); void set(System::Data::DataViewRowState value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于 中的行状态筛选器。

span.span: Gets or sets the row state filter used in the .

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已通过使用已删除的行方法将具有其值设置为`Deleted`。Only rows that have been deleted by using the method will have their value set to `Deleted`. 使用添加这些行方法同样会将属性设置为`Added`。Those rows added using the method will similarly have the property set to `Added`. > [!NOTE] > 使用方法类并不意味着某一行将被标记为`Deleted`。Using the method of the class does not mean that a row will be marked as `Deleted`. 使用方法改为若要确保这样的行，可以查看。Use the method instead to make sure that such rows can be viewed in the . 新行也将是可见设置为`ModifiedCurrent`或`CurrentRows`。New rows will also be visible when the is set to `ModifiedCurrent` or `CurrentRows`. 已删除的行也将是可见设置为`ModifiedOriginal`和`OriginalRows`。Deleted rows will also be visible when the is set to `ModifiedOriginal` and `OriginalRows`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建单个列，然后更改的数据和集的可显示不同的行集，具体取决于。The following example creates a with a single column, and then changes the data and sets the of the to display different row sets, depending on the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataView.RowStateFilter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataView.RowStateFilter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataView.RowStateFilter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataView.RowStateFilter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Sort { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 的一个或多个排序列以及排序顺序。

span.span: Gets or sets the sort column or columns, and sort order for the .

value.span: 一个字符串，该字符串包含后跟“ASC”（升序）或"DESC"（降序）的列名。

span.span: A string that contains the column name followed by "ASC" (ascending) or "DESC" (descending).

value.span: 默认情况下，列按升序排序。

span.span: Columns are sorted ascending by default.

value.span: 可以用逗号分隔多个列。

span.span: Multiple columns can be separated by commas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不显式指定的排序条件`DataView`、`DataRowView`中的对象`DataView`根据其对应的索引按`DataRow`中`DataTable.Rows` `DataRowCollection`。If you do not explicitly specify sort criteria for `DataView`, the `DataRowView` objects in `DataView` are sorted based on the index of its corresponding `DataRow` in the `DataTable.Rows` `DataRowCollection`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Dataview](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/dataviews.md)。For more information, see [DataViews](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/dataviews.md). ## Examples 下面的示例指示表进行排序，按两列。The following example instructs the to sort the table by two columns. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataView.Sort Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataView.Sort Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataView.Sort Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataView.Sort Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 还有属性，后者将返回默认表。The also has a property which returns the default for the table. 例如，如果你想要创建对表的自定义视图，设置上返回。For example, if you want to create a custom view on the table, set the on the returned by the . 仅可设置如果的当前值为 null 的属性。You can only set the property if the current value is null. ## Examples 下面的示例获取的当前。The following example gets the of the current . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataView.Table Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataView.Table Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataView.Table Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataView.Table Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 根据现有 中的行，创建并返回一个新的 。

span.span: Creates and returns a new based on rows in an existing .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回维护源中的以下属性的值: ， ， ，和。The returned maintains the values of the following properties from the source : , , , and . 在随后出现的每个列包含基础中的所有相应属性的相同副本。Each column in the resulting contains an identical copy of all the corresponding properties in the underlying . 在返回的实例`DataTable`将包含与 CLR 语义一致的值。The instances in the returned `DataTable` will contain values that are consistent with CLR semantics. 也就是说，对于除用户定义的类型以外的所有数据类型，相应列的值是通过值复制。That is, for all data types besides user-defined types, the corresponding column values are copied by value. 对于用户定义数据类型，列数据被复制引用。For user-defined data types, the column data is copied by reference.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.DataTable ToTable() cil managed

summary.span: 根据现有 中的行，创建并返回一个新的 。

span.span: Creates and returns a new based on rows in an existing .

returns.span: 一个新的 实例，其中包含所请求的行和列。

span.span: A new instance that contains the requested rows and columns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为此方法不允许您指定的输出名称，其名称是与源的名称相同`DataTable`。Because this method does not let you specify the name for the output , its name is the same as the name of the source `DataTable`. 因为此方法不允许您指定的可用列的子集，则输出表包含列与输入表的列相同。Because this method does not let you specify a subset of available columns, the output table contains the same columns as the input table. ## Examples 下面的控制台应用程序示例创建，填充数据、 创建基于原始数据的筛选的视图，并最后，创建包含筛选的行。The following console application example creates a , fills the with data, creates a filtered view based on the original data, and finally, creates a that contains the filtered rows. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataView.ToTableFiltered#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataView.ToTableFiltered/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataView.ToTableFiltered#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataView.ToTableFiltered/VB/source.vb#1)] 该示例在控制台窗口中显示以下文本：The example displays the following text in the console window: ``` Original table name: NewTable Current Values in Table 1, Fruit, Apple, 14 2, Fruit, Orange, 27 3, Bread, Muffin, 23 4, Fish, Salmon, 12 Current Values in View 2, Fruit, Orange, 27 3, Bread, Muffin, 23 Table created from filtered DataView 2, Fruit, Orange, 27 3, Bread, Muffin, 23 New table name: NewTable ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为此方法不允许您指定的可用列的子集，则输出表包含列与输入表的列相同。Because this method does not let you specify a subset of available columns, the output table contains the same columns as the input table. ## Examples 下面的控制台应用程序示例创建，填充`DataTable`数据、 创建基于原始数据的筛选的视图，并最后创建`DataTable`使用新名称包含的筛选的行。The following console application example creates a , fills the `DataTable` with data, creates a filtered view based on the original data, and finally creates a `DataTable` with a new name that contains the filtered rows. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataView.ToTableNewName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataView.ToTableNewName/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataView.ToTableNewName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataView.ToTableNewName/VB/source.vb#1)] 该示例在控制台窗口中显示以下文本：The example displays the following text in the console window: ``` Original table name: NewTable Current Values in Table 1, Fruit, Apple, 14 2, Fruit, Orange, 27 3, Bread, Muffin, 23 4, Fish, Salmon, 12 Current Values in View 2, Fruit, Orange, 27 3, Bread, Muffin, 23 Table created from filtered DataView 2, Fruit, Orange, 27 3, Bread, Muffin, 23 New table name: FilteredTable ```

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Data.DataTable ToTable (bool distinct, params string[] columnNames);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.DataTable ToTable(bool distinct, string[] columnNames) cil managed
Public Function ToTable (distinct As Boolean, ParamArray columnNames As String()) As DataTable
public: System::Data::DataTable ^ ToTable(bool distinct, ... cli::array <System::String ^> ^ columnNames);

param.name: distinct
param.span: 如果为 ，则返回的 将包含所有列都具有不同值的行。

span.span: If , the returned contains rows that have distinct values for all its columns.
The default value is .

param.name: columnNames
param.span: 一个字符串数组，包含要包括在返回的 中的列名的列表。

span.span: A string array that contains a list of the column names to be included in the returned .

param.span: 包含指定的列，其顺序与这些列在该数组中的顺序相同。

span.span: The contains the specified columns in the order they appear within this array.

summary.span: 根据现有 中的行，创建并返回一个新的 。

span.span: Creates and returns a new based on rows in an existing .

returns.span: 一个新的 实例，其中包含所请求的行和列。

span.span: A new instance that contains the requested rows and columns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为此方法不允许您指定的输出名称，其名称是与源的名称相同。Because this method does not let you specify the name for the output , its name is the same as the name of the source . ## Examples 下面的控制台应用程序示例创建，填充使用数据，排列，并最后创建与仅使用两个列，限制为在其中所有值都是唯一的行。The following console application example creates a , fills the with data, sorts the , and finally creates a with just two columns, limited to rows in which all values are unique. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataView.ToTableUniqueValues#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataView.ToTableUniqueValues/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataView.ToTableUniqueValues#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataView.ToTableUniqueValues/VB/source.vb#1)] 该示例在控制台窗口中显示以下输出：The example displays the following output in the console window: ``` Original table name: NewTable Current Values in Table 1, Fruit, Apple, 14 2, Fruit, Orange, 27 3, Bread, Muffin, 23 4, Fish, Salmon, 12 5, Fish, Salmon, 15 6, Bread, Croissant, 23 Current Values in View 3, Bread, Muffin, 23 6, Bread, Croissant, 23 4, Fish, Salmon, 12 5, Fish, Salmon, 15 1, Fruit, Apple, 14 2, Fruit, Orange, 27 Table created from sorted DataView Bread, 23 Fish, 12 Fish, 15 Fruit, 14 Fruit, 27 New table name: NewTable ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载的版本的方法如果你需要检索一部分可用列中的非重复值指定返回的新名称。Use this overloaded version of the method if you have to retrieve distinct values in a subset of available columns, specifying a new name for the returned . 如果你不需要不同的行或列的子集，请参阅。If you do not need distinct rows or a subset of columns, see . ## Examples 下面的控制台应用程序示例创建，填充使用数据，排列，并最后创建使用新名称，它包含仅使用两个列，限制为在其中所有值都是唯一的行。The following console application example creates a , fills the with data, sorts the , and finally creates a with a new name that contains just two columns, limited to rows in which all values are unique. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataView.ToTableUniqueValuesName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataView.ToTableUniqueValuesName/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataView.ToTableUniqueValuesName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataView.ToTableUniqueValuesName/VB/source.vb#1)] 该示例在控制台窗口中显示以下输出：The example displays the following output in the console window: ``` Original table name: NewTable Current Values in Table 1, Fruit, Apple, 14 2, Fruit, Orange, 27 3, Bread, Muffin, 23 4, Fish, Salmon, 12 5, Fish, Salmon, 15 6, Bread, Croissant, 23 Current Values in View 3, Bread, Muffin, 23 6, Bread, Croissant, 23 4, Fish, Salmon, 12 5, Fish, Salmon, 15 1, Fruit, Apple, 14 2, Fruit, Orange, 27 Table created from sorted DataView Bread, 23 Fish, 12 Fish, 15 Fruit, 14 Fruit, 27 New table name: UniqueData ```
